text: to kya tum itana bhee nahin samajhate? (ai lo are) tum vahee ehamaq log ho ki jis ka tumhen kuchh ilm tha usamen to jhagada kar chuke (khair) phir tab usamen kya (khvaah ma khvaah) jhagadane baithe ho jisakee (sire se) tumhen kuchh khabar nahin aur (haklqate haal to) khuda jaanata hai aur tum nahin jaanate
